sqlMap.select: SELECT Area_Code AS areaCode , ANZ_Cu_Code AS customerCode , ANZ_Sno AS sequenceNumber , ANZ_GongDate AS contractDate , ANZ_Date AS scheduledCheckDate , ANZ_SW_Code AS employeeCode , ANZ_SW_Name AS employeeName , ANZ_CustName AS contractName , ANZ_Tel AS phoneNumber , ANZ_A_01 AS pipeLength1 , ANZ_A_02 AS pipeLength2 , ANZ_A_03 AS pipeLength3 , ANZ_A_04 AS pipeLength4 , ANZ_A_05 AS pipeLength5 , ANZ_B_01 AS valveQuantity1 , ANZ_B_02 AS valveQuantity2 , ANZ_B_03 AS valveQuantity3 , ANZ_B_04 AS valveQuantity4 , ANZ_B_05 AS valveQuantity5 , ANZ_C_01 AS etcEquipmentName1 , ANZ_C_02 AS etcEquipmentQuantity1 , ANZ_C_03 AS etcEquipmentName2 , ANZ_C_04 AS etcEquipmentQuantity2 , ANZ_C_05 AS etcEquipmentName3 , ANZ_C_06 AS etcEquipmentQuantity3 , ANZ_C_07 AS etcEquipmentName4 , ANZ_C_08 AS etcEquipmentQuantity4 , ANZ_D_01 AS combustorRange1 , ANZ_D_02 AS combustorRange2 , ANZ_D_03 AS combustorRange3 , ANZ_D_04 AS combustorRangeEtcName , ANZ_D_05 AS combustorRangeEtcQuantity , ANZ_E_01 AS combustorBoilerType , ANZ_E_02 AS combustorBoilerPosition , ANZ_E_03 AS combustorBoilerConsumption , ANZ_E_04 AS combustorBoilerInstaller , ANZ_F_01 AS combustorHeaterType , ANZ_F_02 AS combustorHeaterPosition , ANZ_F_03 AS combustorHeaterConsumption , ANZ_F_04 AS combustorHeaterInstaller , ANZ_G_01 AS combustorEtcName1 , ANZ_G_02 AS combustorEtcQuantity1 , ANZ_G_03 AS combustorEtcName2 , ANZ_G_04 AS combustorEtcQuantity2 , ANZ_G_05 AS combustorEtcName3 , ANZ_G_06 AS combustorEtcQuantity3 , ANZ_G_07 AS combustorEtcName4 , ANZ_G_08 AS combustorEtcQuantity4 , ANZ_Ga AS acceptable1 , ANZ_Na AS acceptable2 , ANZ_Da AS acceptable3 , ANZ_Ra AS acceptable4 , ANZ_Ma AS acceptable5 , ANZ_Ba AS acceptable6 , ANZ_Sa AS acceptable7 , ANZ_AA AS acceptable8 , ANZ_Ja AS acceptable9 , ANZ_Cha AS acceptable10 , ANZ_Car AS acceptable11 , ANZ_Gae_01 AS notifyRemark1 , ANZ_Gae_02 AS notifyRemark2 , ANZ_Gae_03 AS recommendation1 , ANZ_Gae_04 AS recommendation2 , ANZ_Folder AS signatureFilePath , ANZ_FileName AS signatureFileName , ANZ_App_User AS userId , ANZ_Date_Time AS modifyDate FROM $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi WHERE 1=1 AND Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$' Order BY ANZ_Date Desc, ANZ_Sno Desc

SELECT ANZ.Area_Code AS areaCode , ANZ.ANZ_Cu_Code AS customerCode , ANZ.ANZ_Sno AS sequenceNumber , ANZ.ANZ_GongDate AS contractDate , ANZ.ANZ_Date AS scheduledCheckDate , ANZ.ANZ_SW_Code AS employeeCode , ANZ.ANZ_SW_Name AS employeeName , ANZ.ANZ_CustName AS contractName , ANZ.ANZ_Tel AS phoneNumber , ANZ.ANZ_A_01 AS pipeLength1 , ANZ.ANZ_A_02 AS pipeLength2 , ANZ.ANZ_A_03 AS pipeLength3 , ANZ.ANZ_A_04 AS pipeLength4 , ANZ.ANZ_A_05 AS pipeLength5 , ANZ.ANZ_B_01 AS valveQuantity1 , ANZ.ANZ_B_02 AS valveQuantity2 , ANZ.ANZ_B_03 AS valveQuantity3 , ANZ.ANZ_B_04 AS valveQuantity4 , ANZ.ANZ_B_05 AS valveQuantity5 , ANZ.ANZ_C_01 AS etcEquipmentName1 , ANZ.ANZ_C_02 AS etcEquipmentQuantity1 , ANZ.ANZ_C_03 AS etcEquipmentName2 , ANZ.ANZ_C_04 AS etcEquipmentQuantity2 , ANZ.ANZ_C_05 AS etcEquipmentName3 , ANZ.ANZ_C_06 AS etcEquipmentQuantity3 , ANZ.ANZ_C_07 AS etcEquipmentName4 , ANZ.ANZ_C_08 AS etcEquipmentQuantity4 , ANZ.ANZ_D_01 AS combustorRange1 , ANZ.ANZ_D_02 AS combustorRange2 , ANZ.ANZ_D_03 AS combustorRange3 , ANZ.ANZ_D_04 AS combustorRangeEtcName , ANZ.ANZ_D_05 AS combustorRangeEtcQuantity , ANZ.ANZ_E_01 AS combustorBoilerType , ANZ.ANZ_E_02 AS combustorBoilerPosition , ANZ.ANZ_E_03 AS combustorBoilerConsumption , ANZ.ANZ_E_04 AS combustorBoilerInstaller , ANZ.ANZ_F_01 AS combustorHeaterType , ANZ.ANZ_F_02 AS combustorHeaterPosition , ANZ.ANZ_F_03 AS combustorHeaterConsumption , ANZ.ANZ_F_04 AS combustorHeaterInstaller , ANZ.ANZ_G_01 AS combustorEtcName1 , ANZ.ANZ_G_02 AS combustorEtcQuantity1 , ANZ.ANZ_G_03 AS combustorEtcName2 , ANZ.ANZ_G_04 AS combustorEtcQuantity2 , ANZ.ANZ_G_05 AS combustorEtcName3 , ANZ.ANZ_G_06 AS combustorEtcQuantity3 , ANZ.ANZ_G_07 AS combustorEtcName4 , ANZ.ANZ_G_08 AS combustorEtcQuantity4 , ANZ.ANZ_Ga AS acceptable1 , ANZ.ANZ_Na AS acceptable2 , ANZ.ANZ_Da AS acceptable3 , ANZ.ANZ_Ra AS acceptable4 , ANZ.ANZ_Ma AS acceptable5 , ANZ.ANZ_Ba AS acceptable6 , ANZ.ANZ_Sa AS acceptable7 , ANZ.ANZ_AA AS acceptable8 , ANZ.ANZ_Ja AS acceptable9 , ANZ.ANZ_Cha AS acceptable10 , ANZ.ANZ_Car AS acceptable11 , ANZ.ANZ_Gae_01 AS notifyRemark1 , ANZ.ANZ_Gae_02 AS notifyRemark2 , ANZ.ANZ_Gae_03 AS recommendation1 , ANZ.ANZ_Gae_04 AS recommendation2 , ANZ.ANZ_Folder AS signatureFilePath , ANZ.ANZ_FileName AS signatureFileName , ISNULL(ANZ_S.ANZ_Sign, '') AS signatureImage , ANZ.ANZ_App_User AS userId , ANZ.ANZ_Date_Time AS modifyDate FROM $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi ANZ LEFT OUTER JOIN ANSobi_Sign ANZ_S ON ANZ.Area_Code = ANZ_S.Area_Code AND ANZ.ANZ_Cu_Code = ANZ_S.ANZ_Cu_Code AND ANZ.ANZ_Sno = ANZ_S.ANZ_Sno WHERE 1=1 AND ANZ.Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ.ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' ANZ.ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$' Order BY ANZ.ANZ_Date Desc, ANZ.ANZ_Sno Desc

SELECT Area_Code AS areaCode , ANZ_Cu_Code AS customerCode , ANZ_Sno AS sequenceNumber , Check_TYPE AS checkType , Check_Name AS checkName , ANZ_Date AS scheduledCheckDate , ANZ_SW_Code AS employeeCode , ANZ_SW_Name AS employeeName , ANZ_01 AS acceptable1 , ANZ_02 AS acceptable2 , ANZ_03 AS acceptable3 , ANZ_04 AS acceptable4 , ANZ_05 AS acceptable5 , ANZ_06 AS acceptable6 , ANZ_07 AS acceptable7 , ANZ_08 AS acceptable8 , ANZ_09 AS acceptable9 , ANZ_10 AS acceptable10 , ANZ_11 AS acceptable11 , ANZ_12 AS acceptable12 , ANZ_Sign_YN AS signatureYn , ANZ_Date_Time AS modifyDate FROM $catalogName$.dbo.fn_Sobi_LIST_CU( '$areaCode$', '$customerCode$', '$customerCodeTankFormat$' ) Order BY ANZ_Date Desc, ANZ_Date_Time Desc
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi ( Area_Code , ANZ_Cu_Code , ANZ_Sno , ANZ_GongDate , ANZ_Date , ANZ_SW_Code , ANZ_SW_Name , ANZ_CustName , ANZ_Tel , ANZ_A_01 , ANZ_A_02 , ANZ_A_03 ANZ_Date_Time ) VALUES ( '$areaCode$' , '$customerCode$' , '$sequenceNumber$' , '$contractDate$' , '$scheduledCheckDate$' , '$employeeCode$' , '$employeeName$' , '$contractName$' , '$phoneNumber$' , '$pipeLength1$' , '$pipeLength2$' , '$pipeLength3$' , '$pipeLength4$' , '$pipeLength5$' , '$valveQuantity1$' , '$valveQuantity2$' , '$valveQuantity3$' , '$valveQuantity4$' , '$valveQuantity5$' , '$etcEquipmentName1$' , '$etcEquipmentQuantity1$' , '$etcEquipmentName2$' , '$etcEquipmentQuantity2$' , '$etcEquipmentName3$' , '$etcEquipmentQuantity3$' , '$etcEquipmentName4$' , '$etcEquipmentQuantity4$' , '$combustorRange1$' , '$combustorRange2$' , '$combustorRange3$' , '$combustorRangeEtcName$' , '$combustorRangeEtcQuantity$' , '$combustorBoilerType$' , '$combustorBoilerPosition$' , '$combustorBoilerConsumption$' , '$combustorBoilerInstaller$' , '$combustorHeaterType$' , '$combustorHeaterPosition$' , '$combustorHeaterConsumption$' , '$combustorHeaterInstaller$' , '$combustorEtcName1$' , '$combustorEtcQuantity1$' , '$combustorEtcName2$' , '$combustorEtcQuantity2$' , '$combustorEtcName3$' , '$combustorEtcQuantity3$' , '$combustorEtcName4$' , '$combustorEtcQuantity4$' , '$acceptable1$' , '$acceptable2$' , '$acceptable3$' , '$acceptable4$' , '$acceptable5$' , '$acceptable6$' , '$acceptable7$' , '$acceptable8$' , '$acceptable9$' , '$acceptable10$' , '$acceptable11$' , '$notifyRemark1$' , '$notifyRemark2$' , '$recommendation1$' , '$recommendation2$' , '$signatureFilePath$' , '$signatureFileName$' , '$userId$' , '$modifyDate$' )

INSERT INTO $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi ( Area_Code , ANZ_Cu_Code , ANZ_Sno , ANZ_GongDate , ANZ_Date , ANZ_SW_Code , ANZ_SW_Name , ANZ_CustName , ANZ_Tel , ANZ_A_01 , ANZ_A_02 , ANZ_A_03 , ANZ_A_04 , ANZ_G_08 = '$combustorEtcQuantity4$' ANZ_Ga = '$acceptable1$' ANZ_Na = '$acceptable2$' ANZ_Da = '$acceptable3$' ANZ_Ra = '$acceptable4$' ANZ_Ma = '$acceptable5$' ANZ_Ba = '$acceptable6$' ANZ_Sa = WHERE Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' AND ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$'
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi WHERE Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' AND ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT Area_Code AS areaCode , ANZ_Cu_Code AS customerCode , ANZ_Sno AS sequenceNumber , ANZ_Date AS scheduledCheckDate , ANZ_Sign AS signatureImage , ANZ_ID AS userId
FROM $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi_Sign WHERE 1=1 AND Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$' Order BY ANZ_Date Desc, ANZ_Sno Desc
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi_Sign SET ANZ_Cu_Code = ANZ_Cu_Code ANZ_Date = '$scheduledCheckDate$' ANZ_Sign = '$signatureImage$' ANZ_ID = '$userId$'
WHERE Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' AND ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$'

sqlMap.select:
SELECT ANZ.Area_Code AS areaCode , ANZ.ANZ_Cu_Code AS customerCode , ANZ.ANZ_Sno AS sequenceNumber , ANZ.ANZ_Date AS scheduledCheckDate , ANZ.ANZ_SW_Code AS employeeCode , ANZ.ANZ_SW_Name AS employeeName
, CAST(CAST(ISNULL(ANZ.ANZ_TANK_KG_01, 0) AS NUMERIC(9)) AS VARCHAR) AS tankCapacity1 , CAST(CAST(ISNULL(ANZ.ANZ_TANK_KG_02, 0) AS NUMERIC(9)) AS VARCHAR) AS tankCapacity2 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_01 AS acceptable1 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_01_Bigo AS acceptable1Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_02 AS acceptable2 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_02_Bigo AS acceptable2Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_03 AS acceptable3 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_03_Bigo AS acceptable3Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_04 AS acceptable4 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_04_Bigo AS acceptable4Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_05 AS acceptable5 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_05_Bigo AS acceptable5Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_06 AS acceptable6 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_06_Bigo AS acceptable6Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_07 AS acceptable7 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_07_Bigo AS acceptable7Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_08 AS acceptable8 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_08_Bigo AS acceptable8Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_09 AS acceptable9 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_09_Bigo AS acceptable9Comment , ANZ.ANZ_Check_item_10 AS acceptable10Content , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_10 AS acceptable10 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_10_Bigo AS acceptable10Comment , ANZ.ANZ_Check_item_11 AS acceptable11Content , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_11 AS acceptable11 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_11_Bigo AS acceptable11Comment , ANZ.ANZ_Check_item_12 AS acceptable12Content , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_12 AS acceptable12 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_12_Bigo AS acceptable12Comment , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_SW_Bigo1 AS employeeComment1 , ANZ.ANZ_TANK_SW_Bigo2 AS employeeComment2 , ANZ.ANZ_CustName AS customerName , ANZ.ANZ_Sign_YN AS signatureYn , ISNULL(ANZ_S.ANZ_Sign, '') AS signatureImage , ANZ.ANZ_User_ID AS userId , ANZ.ANZ_Date_Time AS modifyDate FROM $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi_TANK ANZ LEFT OUTER JOIN ANSobi_Sign ANZ_S ON ANZ.Area_Code = ANZ_S.Area_Code AND ANZ.ANZ_Cu_Code = ANZ_S.ANZ_Cu_Code AND ANZ.ANZ_Sno = ANZ_S.ANZ_Sno WHERE 1=1 AND ANZ.Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ.ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' ANZ.ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$' Order BY ANZ.ANZ_Date Desc, ANZ.ANZ_Sno Desc

SELECT AREA_CODE AS areaCode , CU_CODE AS customerCode , ANZ_Date AS scheduledCheckDate , ANZ_SW_Code AS employeeCode , ANZ_SW_Name AS employeeName
, CAST(CAST(ISNULL(ANZ_TANK_KG_01, 0) AS NUMERIC(9)) AS VARCHAR) AS tankCapacity1 , CAST(CAST(ISNULL(ANZ_TANK_KG_02, 0) AS NUMERIC(9)) AS VARCHAR) AS tankCapacity2 , ANZ_TANK_01 AS acceptable1 , ANZ_TANK_01_Bigo AS acceptable1Comment , ANZ_TANK_02 AS acceptable2 , ANZ_TANK_02_Bigo AS acceptable2Comment , ANZ_TANK_03 AS acceptable3 , ANZ_TANK_03_Bigo AS acceptable3Comment , ANZ_TANK_04 AS acceptable4 , ANZ_TANK_04_Bigo AS acceptable4Comment , ANZ_TANK_05 AS acceptable5 , ANZ_TANK_05_Bigo AS acceptable5Comment , ANZ_TANK_06 AS acceptable6 , ANZ_TANK_06_Bigo AS acceptable6Comment , ANZ_TANK_07 AS acceptable7 , ANZ_TANK_07_Bigo AS acceptable7Comment , ANZ_TANK_08 AS acceptable8 , ANZ_TANK_08_Bigo AS acceptable8Comment , ANZ_TANK_09 AS acceptable9 , ANZ_TANK_09_Bigo AS acceptable9Comment , ANZ_Check_item_10 AS acceptable10Content , ANZ_TANK_10 AS acceptable10 , ANZ_TANK_10_Bigo AS acceptable10Comment , ANZ_Check_item_11 AS acceptable11Content , ANZ_TANK_11 AS acceptable11 , ANZ_TANK_11_Bigo AS acceptable11Comment , ANZ_Check_item_12 AS acceptable12Content , ANZ_TANK_12 AS acceptable12 , ANZ_TANK_12_Bigo AS acceptable12Comment , ANZ_TANK_SW_Bigo1 AS employeeComment1 , ANZ_TANK_SW_Bigo2 AS employeeComment2 , ANZ_CustName AS customerName , ANZ_Sign_YN AS signatureYn , ANZ_User_ID AS userId , ANZ_Date_Time AS modifyDate FROM $catalogName$.dbo.fn_Sobi_TANK_INSERT_CU( '$areaCode$', '$customerCode$' )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi_TANK ( Area_Code , ANZ_Cu_Code , ANZ_Sno , ANZ_Date , ANZ_SW_Code , ANZ_SW_Name , ANZ_TANK_KG_01 , ANZ_TANK_KG_02 , ANZ_TANK_01 , ANZ_TANK_01_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_02 , ANZ_TANK_02_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_03 , ANZ_TANK_03_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_04 , ANZ_TANK_04_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_05 , ANZ_TANK_05_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_06 , ANZ_TANK_06_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_07 , ANZ_TANK_07_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_08 , ANZ_TANK_08_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_09 , ANZ_TANK_09_Bigo , ANZ_Check_item_10 , ANZ_TANK_10 , ANZ_TANK_10_Bigo , ANZ_Check_item_11 , ANZ_TANK_11 , ANZ_TANK_11_Bigo , ANZ_Check_item_12 , ANZ_TANK_12 , ANZ_TANK_12_Bigo , ANZ_TANK_SW_Bigo1 , ANZ_TANK_SW_Bigo2 , ANZ_CustName , ANZ_Sign_YN , ANZ_User_ID , ANZ_Date_Time ) VALUES ( '$areaCode$' , '$customerCode$' , '$sequenceNumber$' , '$scheduledCheckDate$' , '$employeeCode$' , '$employeeName$' , '$tankCapacity1$' , '$tankCapacity2$' , '$acceptable1$' , '$acceptable1Comment$' , '$acceptable2$' , '$acceptable2Comment$' , '$acceptable3$' , '$acceptable3Comment$' , '$acceptable4$' , '$acceptable4Comment$' , '$acceptable5$' , '$acceptable5Comment$' , '$acceptable6$' , '$acceptable6Comment$' , '$acceptable7$' , '$acceptable7Comment$' , '$acceptable8$' , '$acceptable8Comment$' , '$acceptable9$' , '$acceptable9Comment$' , '$acceptable10Content$' , '$acceptable10$' , '$acceptable10Comment$' , '$acceptable11Content$' , '$acceptable11$' , '$acceptable11Comment$' , '$acceptable12Content$' , '$acceptable12$' , '$acceptable12Comment$' , '$employeeComment1$' , '$employeeComment2$' , '$customerName$' , '$signatureYn$' , '$userId$' , '$modifyDate$' )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi_TANK SET ANZ_Cu_Code = ANZ_Cu_Code ANZ_Date = '$scheduledCheckDate$' ANZ_SW_Code = '$employeeCode$' ANZ_SW_Name = '$employeeName$' ANZ_TANK_KG_01 = '$tankCapacity1$' ANZ_TANK_KG_02 = '$tankCapacity2$' ANZ_TANK_01 = '$acceptable1$' ANZ_TANK_01_Bigo = '$acceptable1Comment$' ANZ_TANK_02 = '$acceptable2$' ANZ_TANK_02_Bigo = '$acceptable2Comment$' ANZ_TANK_03 = '$acceptable3$' ANZ_TANK_03_Bigo = '$acceptable3Comment$' ANZ_TANK_04 = '$acceptable4$' ANZ_TANK_04_Bigo = '$acceptable4Comment$' ANZ_TANK_05 = '$acceptable5$' ANZ_TANK_05_Bigo = '$acceptable5Comment$' ANZ_TANK_06 = '$acceptable6$' ANZ_TANK_06_Bigo = '$acceptable6Comment$' ANZ_TANK_07 = '$acceptable7$' ANZ_TANK_07_Bigo = '$acceptable7Comment$' ANZ_TANK_08 = '$acceptable8$' ANZ_TANK_08_Bigo = '$acceptable8Comment$' ANZ_TANK_09 = '$acceptable9$' ANZ_TANK_09_Bigo = '$acceptable9Comment$' ANZ_Check_item_10 = '$acceptable10Content$' ANZ_TANK_10 = '$acceptable10$' ANZ_TANK_10_Bigo = '$acceptable10Comment$' ANZ_Check_item_11 = '$acceptable11Content$' ANZ_TANK_11 = '$acceptable11$' ANZ_TANK_11_Bigo = '$acceptable11Comment$' ANZ_Check_item_12 = '$acceptable12Content$' ANZ_TANK_12 = '$acceptable12$' ANZ_TANK_12_Bigo = '$acceptable12Comment$' ANZ_TANK_SW_Bigo1 = '$employeeComment1$' ANZ_TANK_SW_Bigo2 = '$employeeComment2$' ANZ_CustName = '$customerName$' ANZ_Sign_YN = '$signatureYn$' ANZ_User_ID = '$userId$'
WHERE Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' AND ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$'
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM $catalogName$.dbo.ANSobi_TANK WHERE Area_Code = '$areaCode$' AND ANZ_Cu_Code = '$customerCode$' AND ANZ_Sno = '$sequenceNumber$'
